description: At Audyx, we wrote over 40,000 lines of ClojureScript code to build the first web-based calibrated Sonogram. Audyx leverages the power of HTML5 Audio and ClojureScript to build a complete web platform for audiometric institutes: Hearing tests, a calibrated sonogram, test definitions defined by audio experts, patient management, reports, graphs, social, etc.
